note:
3D Cyberpunk Artist and photomanipulator. I'm working on a setting called Circlepunk, which will include elements of Cyberpunk, Folk Horror, Lovecraftian Horror, and Weird Fantasy.

One day, I hope it'll be a comic and TTRPG, for now it's just a series of sassy quotes attached to some of my art pieces.

I try to be a decent person, and I try to communicate in good faith.

If we talk or you follow me, I expect us to be able to communicate without going off on one another, in topics where ableism, racism, transphobia and other very serious issues aren't at stake.

Profile Picture to follow
